title: CapEx Supplier Quality Engineer
summary: Imagine what you could do here! At Apple, new insights have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish...
description: -  In this role, you will partner with equipment supplier and Apple technical team to act as the team’s representative to insure the proper dissemination of specs and requirements, assess supplier capabilities and readiness for manufacturing...
key_qualifications:
-  Experience in other sophisticated capital equipment such as military, aerospace, automotive, large agricultural machinery, electronics etc. Experience in a supplier quality or technical supplier management role.
-  Proficiency using Excel and presentation software.
-  Ability to resolve conflicts and drive compromise. Excellent interpersonal communication skills.
-  Strong background of and equipment quality engineering. Preferred and minimum should be quality trained person.
education_experience: -  A Bachelor's Degree or equivalent experience in Engineering background
